name: Little Things Mean A Lot Baby Girls White Elastic Bloomer Diaper Cover with Embroidered Eyelet Edging - SM
short_description: SIMPLE YET ELEGANT STYLES: Available in 3 different styles for any occasion - Classic - Embroidered Eyelet Edging (Legs Only) - Embroidered Eyelet Edging (Backside & Legs)
FITS A WIDE RANGE OF DIAPER SIZES: Inserted elastic at the waist and legs offer a better fit and more diaper size options for babies and infants.
EASY TO CLEAN & MAINTAIN: Made from super soft and breathable 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton. Machine wash cold.
THE PERFECT ACCESSORY: Perfect for Christening, blessings, photo prop, or daily wear under dresses or over diaper. Makes a great gift!
NOTE: Diaper covers are designed and sized to fit over diapers. They are typically a little larger fit than you might expect from non-diaper cover panties.
product_description: These simple yet elegant white diaper cover bloomers are made of a super soft and breathable 65% polyester, 35% cotton blend. An inserted elastic at the waist and legs offers a better fit and more diaper size options for babies and infants. Easy to clean and maintain. Machine wash cold. Style Breakdown: Classic: Simple and classic diaper cover style, perfect for daily use. Embroidered Eyelet Edging (Legs Only): Features beautiful embroidered eyelet edging around legs. Embroidered Eyelet Edging (Backside & Legs): Features 3 rows of embroidered eyelet edging on the seat, accented with a small centered ribbon bow and matching eyelet edging around the legs. Perfect for Christening, blessings, photo prop, or daily wear under dresses or over diaper. Makes a great gift! NOTE: Diaper covers are designed and sized to fit over diapers. They are typically a little larger fit than you might expect from non-diaper cover panties.
